description:
UnifiedPush distributor using Nextcloud server.
UnifiedPush distributor using Nextcloud server.

It requires the associated Nextcloud application: https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/uppush .

The SSO login requires the Nextcloud App to work : https://f-droid.org/packages/com.nextcloud.client/ .
You can also connect directly to Nextcloud. We recommend using an application password.

More information about UnifiedPush at https://unifiedpush.org .
